remarks: The edge function of an undirected hypergraph is a function into the power set of the set of vertices.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-Dec-2017.)  (Revised by AV, 18-Jan-2020.)
statement:
uhgf.v $e |- V = ( Base ` G ) $.
uhgf.e $e |- E = ( .ef ` G ) $.
uhgf $p |- ( G e. UHGraph -> E : dom E --> ( ~P V \ { (/) } ) ) $.
